mapper.select: SELECT t.id, t.content, t.`desc`, t.priority, t.is_habit, t.create_time, t.update_time, t.delete_time, t.is_complete, t.is_delete FROM t_task t WHERE (t.content LIKE CONCAT('%',#{content},'%') OR #{content} = '' ) AND (t.`desc` LIKE CONCAT('%',#{desc},'%') OR #{desc} = '' ) AND (t.priority = #{priority} OR #{priority} IS NULL ) AND (t.is_habit = #{isHabit} OR #{isHabit} IS NULL ) AND (t.is_complete = #{isComplete} OR #{isComplete} IS NULL ) LIMIT #{start}, #{offset}

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_task ( content, `desc`, priority, is_habit, create_time ) VALUES ( #{content}, #{desc}, #{priority}, #{isHabit}, now() )
mapper.update: UPDATE t_task SET is_delete = 1 WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT t.id, t.content, t.`desc`, t.priority, t.is_habit, t.create_time, t.update_time, t.delete_time, t.is_complete, t.is_delete FROM t_task t WHERE t.is_complete = 1 AND t.is_delete =0 LIMIT #{start},#{offset}
SELECT count(t.id) FROM t_task t WHERE t.is_complete = 1 AND t.is_delete =0

SELECT a.id, a.content, a.`desc`, a.is_habit, a.create_time, a.update_time, a.delete_time, a.is_complete, a.is_delete FROM ( SELECT t.id, t.content, t.`desc`, t.is_habit, t.create_time, t.update_time, t.delete_time, t.is_complete, t.is_delete FROM t_task t LEFT JOIN t_time_expected te ON t.id = te.task_id GROUP BY te.task_id HAVING UNIX_TIMESTAMP( NOW( ) ) < UNIX_TIMESTAMP( max( te.end_time_expected ) ) OR max( te.end_time_expected ) IS NULL ) AS a CROSS JOIN ( SELECT t.id, t.content, t.`desc`, t.is_habit, t.create_time, t.update_time, t.delete_time, t.is_complete, t.is_delete FROM t_task t LEFT JOIN t_time_actual ta ON t.id = ta.task_id WHERE ta.begin_time_actual IS NULL AND t.is_complete = 0 AND t.is_delete = 0 ) AS b ON a.id = b.id LIMIT #{start},#{offset}

SELECT count( a.id ) FROM ( SELECT t.id FROM t_task t LEFT JOIN t_time_expected te ON t.id = te.task_id GROUP BY te.task_id HAVING UNIX_TIMESTAMP( NOW( ) ) < UNIX_TIMESTAMP( max( te.end_time_expected ) ) OR max( te.end_time_expected ) IS NULL ) AS a CROSS JOIN ( SELECT t.id FROM t_task t LEFT JOIN t_time_actual ta ON t.id = ta.task_id WHERE ta.begin_time_actual IS NULL AND t.is_complete = 0 AND t.is_delete = 0 ) AS b ON a.id = b.id
